message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 3 rounds.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the exclusivity, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to come to a fair agreement. After considering your offer, I am willing to sell the product for $105. This is my final offer for this round.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. $105 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $95. This is my final offer for this round. If it doesn't work for you, I'll need to look at other options.
I understand your situation, Bob. In light of your final offer, I am willing to sell the product for $100. This is my best offer for this round. I hope we can agree on this price.
